entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 6:20 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 20 cm except 10 cm inland. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
